thread.title: Frontier Offers 1-Year Membership of Amazon Prime FREE
thread.title_full: Frontier Offers 1-Year Membership of Amazon Prime FREE

author: admin
title: Frontier Offers 1-Year Membership of Amazon Prime FREE
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/22/2015 @ 5:21 AM   Frontier Communications 
MENOMONEE FALLS, Wis., Oct. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- Frontier Communications is offering a free year-long membership to Amazon Prime (a $99 value) to all customers who switch to Frontier services. In addition to the free Amazon Prime members, new customers who take advantage of this limited time offer receive a 2-year guaranteed Price Lock with their 1-year agreement. 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151021/279412 
Frontier Communications' low prices on Internet, TV and Phone service are now combined with the best offer in the market. Yet more, Frontier Communications provides stellar customer service, with customers leaving rave reviews: 
"Excellent service and truly tried to find the best pricing. Much better than other providers," says Jason W. (Fort Wayne, IN). 
According to Chelsea B. from Beaverton, OR. Frontier is, "Absolutely wonderful. Exceptional customer service and great service. I love that there's no hidden charges or price hikes. I was at the end of my rope with Comcast's horrible customer service and hidden fees. Highly recommended! Thank you so much!" 
With reviews like these, it is no wonder that Frontier Internet ( http://www.get-frontier.com/high-speed-internet/ ) is rated 4.3 out of a possible 5 stars. 
And now it gets even better, because customers can use their high speed Frontier internet to try Amazon Prime membership free for a full year.The free Amazon Prime membership will allow customers to have access to unlimited streaming of tens of thousands of movies, TV shows, songs, and eBooks. Also included in an Amazon Prime membership is FREE 2-day shipping on thousands of items. 
In addition to the Amazon Prime membership, there are many other perks offered to customers by Frontier Communications: -- 2-Year Price-lock guarantee -- Phone, internet, and cable in one consolidated bill -- 100% U.S. based customer service -- Multiple packages to choose from so you are sure to find one that fits your needs -- Over 330 digital channels, and FREE HD for life included through partnership with DISH -- Unlimited local calling -- Crystal clear calls with extreme reliability -- Free professional installation -- Security for your home, computer, and personal identity 
Frontier is the 6(th) largest local exchange carrier and 5(th) largest provider of digital subscriber line (based on coverage area) in the United States. In addition to telephone service, Frontier ( Get-Frontier.com ) offers internet, digital TV service, and computer technical support to both businesses and residential customers. 
Media Contact: Matthew Clausen, Get-Frontier.com, 800-544-3046, pr@get-frontier.com 
News distributed by PR Newswire iReach: https://ireach.prnewswire.com 
SOURCE Frontier Communications
